step_feedback.feedback: Good job finding a comfortable position. Try to keep your shoulders and elbows a bit more stable as you inhale and tighten your body.
You're doing well with placing your hands on your abdomen. Focus on keeping your shoulders and elbows steady during this step.
Excellent work tightening your whole body muscles as you inhale. Aim for a little more stillness in your shoulders and elbows, and try to keep your wrists from moving too much.
Great job relaxing your muscles as you exhale. Continue to focus on keeping your shoulders and elbows stable, and try to minimize wrist movement.

exercise_summary: You're doing a good job with deep breathing to help your lymphatic system. Remember to keep your body still, especially your shoulders and elbows, as you inhale and exhale. This helps the fluid move effectively.
